title: Introduction to SEO
description: Overview of SEO, how search engines work and the basics every beginner should know.
content: This lesson introduces the fundamentals of search engine optimization: keywords, on-page SEO, and why technical SEO matters.

title: Keyword Research & Tools
description: How to find and prioritize keywords using free and paid tools.
content: Step-by-step guide to performing keyword research, understanding intent, and grouping keywords for pages.

title: On-Page SEO Best Practices
description: Optimizing page titles, meta descriptions, headings and content structure.
content: Practical on-page SEO checklist and real examples of improving page relevance and CTR.

title: Productivity Foundations
description: Core principles for improving daily productivity and focus.
content: Techniques like time blocking, prioritisation, and simple habit changes that give immediate wins.

title: Tools & Routines
description: Practical walkthrough of apps and daily routines that boost productivity.
content: Demo of task managers, calendar setups, and morning/evening routines with examples.

title: IT Fundamentals — Hardware & OS
description: Introduction to basic hardware components and operating system concepts.
content: Covers CPU, RAM, storage, and an overview of Windows / Linux basics relevant for IT beginners.

title: Networking Basics
description: Simple networking concepts every IT professional should understand.
content: IP addresses, subnetting overview, routers vs switches, and basic troubleshooting commands.

title: IT Fundamentals — Practical Lab
description: Hands-on lab: install and configure a basic Linux VM.
content: Walkthrough of creating a virtual machine, installing Ubuntu Server, and connecting via SSH.

title: Soft Skills — Communication
description: Improve your workplace communication and active listening.
content: Tips for clear emails, meetings, giving feedback and active listening exercises.

title: Emotional Intelligence at Work
description: Recognising emotions and responding professionally.
content: Frameworks for self-awareness, empathy, and handling difficult conversations.

title: Software Development — SDLC Overview
description: Introduction to software development lifecycle and common methodologies.
content: Compare Waterfall, Agile, Scrum and DevOps practices with practical examples.

title: Version Control with Git
description: Basics of Git, commits, branches and collaboration workflows.
content: Hands-on commands and a workflow example for feature branches and pull requests.

title: Social Media Marketing — Strategy
description: Creating an effective social media strategy for brands.
content: Audience research, channel selection, content pillars and scheduling cadence.

title: Content Creation & Calendars
description: Practical content creation tips and how to build a monthly content calendar.
content: From idea to post: formats, repurposing content and calendar examples.

title: Effective Communication — Foundations
description: Key communication skills to present ideas clearly and confidently.
content: Public speaking basics, structuring presentations and handling Q&A.

title: Conversation & Negotiation Techniques
description: Tools to manage difficult conversations and negotiate effectively.
content: Practical frameworks and role-play examples for better negotiation outcomes.

title: Leadership Essentials
description: Foundations of leadership for new managers.
content: Setting vision, delegating, feedback loops and building trust with your team.

title: Managing Performance
description: Performance reviews, continuous feedback and coaching techniques.
content: How to conduct effective reviews and create development plans that work.

title: Python — Getting Started
description: Setup, installing Python, and writing your first script.
content: Install steps for Windows/Mac/Linux and a simple 'Hello, world!' script with explanation.

title: Variables, Types & Basic I/O
description: Understanding variables, common data types and basic input/output in Python.
content: Practical examples covering strings, integers, lists, and reading/writing from console.

title: Digital Marketing — Strategy Overview
description: High-level digital marketing strategy: channels, funnel and KPIs.
content: How to design a campaign, choose channels and measure success across paid and organic.

title: Paid Advertising Basics
description: Intro to paid channels: search ads, social ads and measurement.
content: Setting up simple campaigns, tracking conversions and optimising budgets.
